note: Twisted projectors verified against paper lines 247-249 (label ProjectorsTwistedFib, actually eq 2.24 not 2.13). All three projectors match the paper. Spot-checked P_tau^(1) idempotency: eigenvalue 1 in sector (1) confirmed via 2xi^3+1=xi^2*(1+xi^2). Eigenvalue 0 in sector (2) confirmed via identity 1+xi*omega+omega^2=0 where omega=e^{4pi*i/5} (numerical check: 1+(-1.309+0.951i)+(0.309-0.951i)=0). The 'eq 2.16' reference is actually eq 2.25 (label projectorsInGeneral).
